history.proof: intros. unfold sts, snd_trans, snd_transI, st_inv.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
d0: dstatelet
ii: InductiveInv
s: SendInv

Goal:
s \In sts ii -> snd_transI (st_inv (s:=s)) \In snd_trans ProtocolWithIndInv

Premises:
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Record SendInv : Type := SI { st : send_trans coh; st_inv : S_inv st } Arguments SI [st]
sts = fun i : InductiveInv => let (sts, rts, _, _) := i in sts : InductiveInv -> seq SendInv
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
snd_trans : forall p : Protocols.protocol, seq (send_trans (Protocols.coh p))
snd_transI : forall st : send_trans coh, S_inv st -> Transitions.send_trans CohI
st_inv : forall s : SendInv, S_inv (st s)
Record InductiveInv : Type := II { sts : seq SendInv; rts : seq ReceiveInv; _ : [seq st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p; _ : [seq rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p } Arguments II [sts rts]%seq_scope
nid = nat : Set
ProtocolWithIndInv = Protocol l us ur : Protocols.protocol
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv s : SendInv |- Type] ?T' : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv s : SendInv |- Type] ?f : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv s : SendInv |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv s : SendInv |- ?T'] ?s : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv s : SendInv |- seq ?T]
functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv s : SendInv |- Type] ?B : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv s : SendInv |- Type]
stsI = [eta map (fun stt : SendInv => snd_transI (st_inv (s:=stt)))] : seq SendInv -> seq (Transitions.send_trans CohI) Arguments stsI _%seq_scope
us = (fun _evar_0_ : forall (sts0 : seq SendInv) (rts : seq ReceiveInv) (e : [seq st i | i <- sts0] = snd_trans p) (e0 : [seq rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p), (fun i : InductiveInv => is_true (uniq [seq t_snd i | i <- stsI (sts i)])) (II e e0) => match ii as i return ((fun i0 : InductiveInv => is_true (uniq [seq t_snd i | i <- stsI (sts i0)])) i) with | @II x x0 x1 x2 => _evar_0_ x x0 x1 x2 end) (fun (sts0 : seq SendInv) (rts : seq ReceiveInv) (Hs : [seq st i | i <- sts0] = snd_trans p) (Hr : [seq rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p) => (fun _evar_0_ : uniq [seq (t_snd (coh:=CohI...
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
rely_refl : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s : state), s \In Coh w -> network_rely w this s s
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
s_step_coh : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh), Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh (Transitions.t_snd s) (Transitions.send_step (s:=s))
Transitions.s_step_coh : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh), Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh (Transitions.t_snd s) (Transitions.send_step (s:=s))
cohpred_PredType = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => mkPredType (Coherence.sort (nodes:=nodes)) : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> PredType dstatelet Arguments cohpred_PredType _%function_scope
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Image_mem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (P : Pred A) (x : A), x \In P -> f x \In [Image f i | i <- P]
ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
send_step_t = Transitions.send_step_t : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments send_step_t _%function_scope
mkWorld = fun p : protocol => (plab p \\-> p, Unit) : protocol -> world
image_spec_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : Prop), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
image_spec_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : SProp), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
snd_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.snd_tags ([::] : seq (send_trans coh))) Arguments snd_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
rcv_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags ([::] : seq (receive_trans coh))) Arguments rcv_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
Record receive_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := ReceiveTrans { t_rcv : nat; msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool; receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh; r_step_coh : Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step } Arguments Transitions.receive_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.ReceiveTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_rcv]%nat_scope [msg_wf]%function_scope [receive_step]
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
Im_mem : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (a : A), b = f a -> a \In P -> image_spec P f b
Coherence.sort : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, Coherence.cohpred nodes -> dstatelet -> Prop
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
network_rely' = fun (w : world) (this : nid) => fix network_rely' (n : nat) (s1 s2 : state) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0 => s1 = s2 /\ s1 \In Coh w | n'.+1 => exists (z : nat_eqType) (s3 : state), [/\ this != z, network_step w z s1 s3 & network_rely' n' s3 s2] end : world -> nid -> nat -> state -> state -> Prop Arguments network_rely' _ _ _%nat_scope

```intros. unfold sts, snd_trans, snd_transI, st_inv. rewrite in_map_iff. intros [s Hs]. intros [HH1 HH2]. split.
- unfold stsI. rewrite in_map_iff. exists s. auto.
- unfold ProtocolWithIndInv. unfold snd_trans, snd_transI. rewrite in_map_iff. exists s. auto.```

original: intros. unfold sts, snd_trans, snd_transI, st_inv. rewrite in_map_iff. intros [s Hs]. intros [HH1 HH2]. split. - unfold stsI. rewrite in_map_iff. exists s. auto. - unfold ProtocolWithIndInv. unfold snd_trans, snd_transI. rewrite in_map_iff. exists s. auto.
